data.text:
@SuB8u Nothing wrong or unpredictable in these graphs.
Furthermore,  it unavoidable until we all understand that is airborne disease and start to treat it accordingly.
@SuB8u AFIK, In India, there is absolutely no proper reporting being done. Local Governments have basically mandated to stop reporting numbers which is sad.
@isenditbacc Can't ignore case count at at this scale
@SuB8u There is vaccine resistance in Hong Kong. The reason why is impolitic to state publicly.

@SuB8u I think we should move away from case count as a metric now since the severe illness or death arising from fresh cases is significantly lower than it used to be. I would expect cases to rise a lot as people head back into normalcy.
